text: Checkout kiosks are much faster. The “buy 1 get 1 free” sign at the kiosk was confusing. In the end, I bought two tubes of L’Oreal 32H infallible matter cover with 35% discount.

I needed to get some gauze bandage but I was with my dog in a pram outside the store. Kate (trainee staff I think) was handing out pamplets at the store entrance. When I approached her help to make the purchase for me as I was unable to leave my dog outside, she gladly went to grab the stuff for me. She even made multiple trips to let me see the options available and even to help me get my membership details. Really very kind and helpful gal. Made the shopping experience so much better and efficient for me! Thank you Kate! Keep up the good work! Happy says thank you too!
I love buying in Watsons Vivo City because the Store Manager Abigail is very warm and welcoming. You will surely buy items if she happens to assist you. Happy GNC is back in Watson.

Today I went to vivo city watsons to shop for some daily necessities that I usually use. I found that the watsons service staff candy & Abigail who are polite and customer service- oriented the staff is very friendly and helpful.
love the environment!!
I love shopping at Vivo City. The Manager Abigail is very warm and friendly. And the Pharmacist are very knowledge. And promoter Limei and Gwen are super friendly
